text: He mominaharu! Purusaharule arko purusako upahasa nagarun. Sambhava cha ki uniharu tiniharubhanda ramra ho'un ra striharule arko striko (hamso) nagarun, sambhava cha ki uniharu tiniharubhanda ramri ho'un ra apasama eka arkala'i aksepa nagara na naramro upadhile nai sambodhana gara imana lya'isakepachi naramro namakarana garnu papa ho. (Yasabata) jasale prayascita gardaina, uniharu atyacari hun
